nbcwashington.com/2015/04/metro-police-a.snippet: Metro Transit Police arrested a New York graffiti artist for vandalizing Metro railcars. Metro police said they arrested Jordan Reese McConeghy, 24, of Brooklyn Wednesday on charges of felony property destruction.
